org.apache.giraph.io.formats

类 PseudoRandomEdgeInputFormat

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, GiraphInputFormat

    public class PseudoRandomEdgeInputFormat
extends EdgeInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
    This EdgeInputFormat generates pseudo-random edges on the fly. As with PseudoRandomVertexInputFormat, the user specifies the number of vertices and the number of edges per vertex.

      • createEdgeReader

        public EdgeReader<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable> createEdgeReader(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit split,
                                                                                                 org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.TaskAttemptContext context)
                                                                                                   throws IOException
        从类复制的说明: EdgeInputFormat
        Create an edge reader for a given split. The framework will call EdgeReader.initialize(InputSplit, TaskAttemptContext) before the split is used.
        指定者:
        createEdgeReader 在类中 EdgeInputFormat<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.DoubleWritable>
        参数:
        split - the split to be read
        context - the information about the task
        返回:
        a new record reader
        抛出:
        IOException
